Articles.Content:
Again,

Guys off topic... I will stop making these and hopefully other people too because this is TERRIBLE

Again discuss 0.18 please

The problem is 0.18 hasn't even been announced yet, so we have no clue what we're discussing.

But I've got my fingers crossed for some awesome surprise I haven't been imaginative enough to come up with yet xD

Why are there two 0.18 discussion threads? Why is there even an 0.18 discussion thread. .17.1 hasn't even come out, and we don't know what will be in 0.18. Please let the devs announce it and then make the thread in the development section.
Skunky made one as soon as 0.17 was out. That got locked pretty quickly... I guess he's just continuing the trend...

Skunky made one as soon as 0.17 was out. That got locked pretty quickly... I guess he's just continuing the trend...

No. There are two "[uNOFFICIAL/FANMADE] 0.18 Discussion Thread 2's"
Stop the insanity. If you have a thought that's worthy of discussion, post it in it's own thread. A conglomeration of unrelated discussions doesn't belong in the same thread, anyway.

Why are there two 0.18 discussion threads? Why is there even an 0.18 discussion thread. .17.1 hasn't even come out, and we don't know what will be in 0.18. Please let the devs announce it and then make the thread in the development section.

There is no matter that 0.17.1 isn't out jet. If you want you can even make a 0.19 discus tread (right?).

What is there to discuss? Discussing ANYTHING that's not in 0.18 and it's off topic. Seeing as we don't know what it is about, and speculation is off topic and frowned upon, there is nothing to discuss and the entire thread is off topic. You cannot have an "on topic" thread if you don't have a topic.

What is there to discuss? Discussing ANYTHING that's not in 0.18 and it's off topic. Seeing as we don't know what it is about, and speculation is off topic and frowned upon, there is nothing to discuss and the entire thread is off topic. You cannot have an "on topic" thread if you don't have a topic.

Predicting what will happen is alright.

And why are you arguing ? I made the thread to discuss 0.18 and what will happen. You shouldn't argue. I think there should be a mod comment for your posts

Predicting what will happen is alright.

And why are you arguing ? I made the thread to discuss 0.18 and what will happen. You shouldn't argue. I think there should be a mod comment for your posts

First of all, this thread is a duplicate: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/22501-UNOFFICIAL-FANMADE-0-18-Discussion-thread-2

Second of all, these threads always get locked. It would be better to have a thread in the 'Development' section when 0.18 is actually announced. Then we can actually be on topic. There is no topic to discuss so we have to speculate. I almost got the 0.17 discussion thread locked by speculating. Can't we just wait until they announce 0.18?

How about a 0.18 speculation thread? Or even better, some Mods that don't lose it whenever somebody goes a tiny bit off topic and lock an entire thread for it? Sorry but this is ridiculous, all it takes is one idiot to mention something other than the exact purpose of a topic and it gets locked.

Yes, predicting what will be added, but not yelling at squad for not adding docking yet.

Here, have a planned features list to base your speculations on

Or even better, some Mods that don't lose it whenever somebody goes a tiny bit off topic and lock an entire thread for it? Sorry but this is ridiculous, all it takes is one idiot to mention something other than the exact purpose of a topic and it gets locked.

Meh, honestly, there shouldn't have been such a thread in the first place. Without an official announcement about the features for 0.18, things are likely to get out of hand more quickly.

Anyway, as this is an unofficial thread, off-topic is more difficult, so our only real concern will be that everyone follows the general rules of the forum.

And yeah, don't yell at SQUAD for whatever reason, only constructive criticism is welcome, and you know you love them anyway

Meh, honestly, there shouldn't have been such a thread in the first place. Without an official announcement about the features for 0.18, things are likely to get out of hand more quickly.

Anyway, as this is an unofficial thread, off-topic is more difficult, so our only real concern will be that everyone follows the general rules of the forum.

Fair enough, I can see why you lock these sorts of topics now.

Does anyone else think that the twin gas giant nova put in his "kerbals guide to the solar system" will become real in future versions? I know more planets are planned, and I think it'd look awesome, especially if they're different colours (Yes, I realise this is may not happen in real life, but its a game and it'd be pretty)
This thread is so completely pointless. It's here for no reason. Everyone just wants to be the OP of a discussion thread. Calm down, people.
Just delete this thread and all the other ones mods. No need for them, I could do a thread like this again when we get info on 0.18 but until then close all 0.18 discussion threads

I'll close this for you kacperrutka26, you have tried hard to keep a good discussion going and I thank you for that, but I guess major updates should really be official threads only.

Speculation is fine in Off-Topic though, but for now we should all wait until some concrete information from Squad about what to expect in 0.18 and later updates.

Thread closed.
